subject_migrate_user.message: Set up your new Webmaker account password

new_log_in.message: Webmaker is using a new log in system to ensure your experience is simple and safe. To get started, click here to set a password, or copy and paste this migration token into the text field:
new_log_in.description: Describes the purpose of the email

need_help.message: If you did not try to create a password, you can ignore this message, or send an email to help@webmaker.org to ask for help.
need_help.description: A message describing how to set a password or seek help
